info.name: CHISV API
info.description: API descriptions with examples for CHISV API endpoints.

item.name:
Issue a JWT token for a user
Call without any existing Bearer token (remove from example). Will issue a JWT token (access_token) via the OAuth API by using the password_grant type.
Create multiple bids at once by params

query.description: string required the start time of events
string required the end time of events

item.name: Get a preview of all open conferences for public display
Create a notification for users of a conference

variable.description: The conference to get by key

item.name: Create or update multiple tasks by import

Enroll a user to be an SV for the conference with state 'enrolled'
Use a dictionary of field names as keys value pairs.
Use the field names from the currently active enrollment form. The
fields below are just examples.
Unenrolls a user from the conference

variable.description: The day to run the auction for

item.name:
Update enrollment form weights based on submitted weights
Use a dictionary of field names as keys value pairs.
Use the field names from the currently active enrollment form. The
fields below are just examples.

Delete all tasks for specified days

query.description: Array of strings of all days in JSON

item.name:
Get all days where the conference has tasks
We need this for the calendar in the GUI
Get all tasks which match the query

query.description: array of strings. Limit to array of specific days YYYY-MM-DD
array of ints. Limit to array of specific priorities
array of strings. Limit the time, has two items

item.name: Get all assignments and users which match the query

array<string> Limit the time, has two items

item.name: Get all users of a conference matching the query

query.description: array of ints. Limit to array of specific states

item.name: Get all notifications of the authenticated user

Get a report by name
The result will contain all important columns and pagination hint. Available reports are:
'sv_doubles',
'sv_accepted_minutes_ago',
'sv_shirts',
'sv_hours',
'sv_bids',
'sv_detail',
'sv_demographics_country',
'sv_demographics_language',
'task_overview',
'tasks_free_slots',
'tasks_table_dump'
Get all bids for a user of a given conference
Get all notifications for a user of a given conference

query.description: int Limit to university by id
string Limit to university by name
